text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: Earth has not anything to show more fair:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr r09_line

LMNL.text: Dull would he be of soul who could pass by

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr r10_line

LMNL.text: A sight so touching in its majesty:

LMNL.text: All bright and glittering in the smokeless air.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r30_quatrain r31_s r32_phr r33_line

LMNL.text: Never did sun more beautifully steep

LMNL.text: The river glideth at his own sweet will:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r42_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r42_s r45_couplet r46_line r47_phr

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r45_couplet r48_s r50_line r51_phr

LMNL.text: And all that mighty heart is lying still!
